data.name: Purple Fantasy
data.detailed_description:
Game Introduction

The game is mainly a traditional jigsaw puzzle game, you can pass the level by splicing all the irregular pieces back to their original positions! The biggest feature of the game is the ability to customize the levels, and you can import your favorite pictures from the local or the network for splicing.

High degree of freedom custom level system

  • Supports images of any size!
  • Multiple colors of ambient lighting for you to choose from! And the intensity can be adjusted.
  • Customize the number of fragments to be spliced
  • Not only can import local pictures, but also network pictures!

If you want to quickly experience the puzzle, the game also has its own levels for you to experience~

data.short_description: "purple fantasy" is a super free anime puzzle game! You can experience it by making the level you want~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: "Purple Fantasy" contains adult-only content. The main topics included are naked female illustrations, lesbians, sexual intercourse, and inhuman witches.
